title: White House Press Secretary Jen Psaki Tests Positive for Covid-19
sub_head: Spokeswoman, who didn’t accompany Biden to Europe, got first negative test Sunday and is experiencing mild symptoms
body:
WASHINGTON—White House press secretary Jen Psaki said she tested positive for Covid-19 and was experiencing mild symptoms.
She said in a statement that she hadn’t had contact with President Biden or senior White House staff since Wednesday, when she began isolating at home.
